Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.domain

Interface FreeTileState

All Superinterfaces:
Printable
All Known Implementing Classes:
EmptyState, ExitLockState, InformationState, KeyState, LockedDoorState, TreasureState
public interface FreeTileState extends Printable
FreeTileState is the internal state of a free tile. I.E. What the free tile contains inside.
Author:
Brandon Ru 300562436

  • Method Details

    • isWall

      boolean isWall()
      Is the tile an obstruction, UNDER THIS STATE. If this is true --> Do not let the player walk through. Otherwise --> The player can walk through.
      Returns:
      Obstruction boolean.

    • performAction

      void performAction(Player p, FreeTile tile)
      Perform action on the parent tile, given the state. For example, the player steps onto the key tile. The player --> gains a key The tile --> reverts to a state of empty.
